text: "Love Me, Love Me Love" is a single recorded on PolydorRPM online (retrieved 25 March 2018) in 1971 by Canadian Frank Mills. It was a #1 hit in Canada for two weeks, starting on 26 February 1972.RPM, Volume 17, issues #2 and 3. The song appeared on Mills' first solo album, Seven Of My Songs, and made its debut on the Canadian charts in October 1971. It reached #1 on the RPM chart, number 46 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100, and number 8 on Billboard′s Easy Listening chart. == Notes == == External links == * Frank Mills at Jam.canoe.ca Category:1971 singles Category:Frank Mills songs Category:RPM Top Singles number-one singles Category:1971 songs
title: Love Me, Love Me Love
